Title: Chairman Mao inspects the Shanghai Steelworks
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: One of the very few posters picturing Mao Zedong in Shanghai. For a similar image, see the 1970 poster 'Chairman Mao's heart and ours are one'. Both are based on Jin Shangyi's 1969 painting "Chairman Mao inspects  Shanghai Steel Plant no. 3 (毛主席视察上钢三厂).
